title: Edin Dzeko to Chelsea? We pick out striker's top five Premier League moments at Manchester City
description: Edin Dzeko could be on his way back to the Premier League, after Sky in Italy reported Chelsea and Roma have agreed terms on a transfer.Â
content: The striker has already found the net twice at Stamford Bridge this season, after grabbing two goals in a 3-3 Champions League group stage draw.But he could now be on course to add to the 50 Premier League goals he scored for Manchester City between 2011 and 2016.Here, we pick out his top five moments during that spell - including a key role in City's famous last-gasp title triumph in 2012...
